blog.title: Democracy beyond the nation-state - What is there ?
blog.description: When climate, water, and digital challenges cross borders but democracy doesn't, what's the alternative? This narrative essay compares confederation, federation, and cosmopolitan democracy through three fictional characters on a Barcelona-Tunis ferry.

nftMetadata.description: AI generated artwork based on the prompt: "A quiet 2 a.m. ferry lounge between Barcelona and Tunis. Three characters sit apart but connected by scattered documents: Amara with Mediterranean water-basin charts, Sofia with EU briefing notes, and Adam with a glowing laptop showing AI regulations. Soft overhead ferry lights, empty seats, coffee machine humming in the background. Behind them, faint symbolic overlays: a confederation map dissolving into fragments, a federal structure with connected nodes, and a network-like web representing cosmopolitan democracy. Moody, reflective, cinematic atmosphere."
